name: blacksmith trial
description:
blacksmith trial is a puzzle game based on reconstructing  statues in which speed, memory and the ability to recognize shapes at a glance are rewarded.

In this game, you have to face a traditional trial that the player, a son of the blacksmith god, has to get over to be recognized as an adult in the heaven world. In this trial, the player has to reforge a series of ancient sacred statues that are a memory of an old civilization.
